objectArray.text: Costumes are sold here. Let's prepare your costumes here.

Awards Bouquet drops are increased from 10 to 30 when Quest Rank is increased to 2.
*<color=#FF7070>If the Rank is increased during Memory Rematch</color>, the Awards Bouquet drop amount will be based on <color=#FF7070>the Rank at the time the Memory Rematch clear time is recorded</color>.

Awards Bouquet drops are increased from 30 to 40 when Quest Rank is increased to 3.
*<color=#FF7070>If the Rank is increased during Memory Rematch</color>, the Awards Bouquet drop amount will be based on <color=#FF7070>the Rank at the time the Memory Rematch clear time is recorded</color>.

*<color=#FF7070>If the Rank is increased during Memory Rematch</color>, the Awards Bouquet drop amount will be based on <color=#FF7070>the Rank at the time the Memory Rematch clear time is recorded</color>.
